title: Arsenal transfer news and rumours: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Abdou Diallo
description: All the latest Arsenal transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Thursday, January 25.
content: Arsenal are hoping to complete a deal to sign Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang in the coming days, according to the Daily Mail.It is suggested the deal could go through in time for the striker to make his debut against Swansea City next Tuesday.Meanwhile, the Gunners are reportedly eyeing up Mainz defender Abdou Diallo as Arsene Wenger vows to carry on spending in the January transfer window, reports the Daily Mirror.Finally, former Arsenal defender Bacary Sagna could be linking up with Serie A bottom side Benevento, according to The Sun.
